生活了 30 多年的地方，如今却要搬离了。再也见不到那些情景了。用手中的渣手机拍下来吧，就当是能留住了。

本身对村子没什么特殊的情感，但是现在却有点可惜，再也见不到油菜花田和稻田了。后悔之前没有拍下来。这些画面擦除的太快，没有留下什么。

title: 保持警惕：多个国产 APP 滥用相册权限(转)
content:
在 iOS 15 推出后，人们利用记录 APP 活动功能发现了许多令人不安的现象。

微信、QQ 、淘宝，这些主流的国产 APP 正在滥用相册权限，日志显示这些它们在用户未使用的情况下在后台以很高的频率长时间读取相册。

Apple 对应用程序的审查以严格著称，但对于一些 APP 来说，这种审查依然是可以绕过的。一旦用户授予它们完整的相册权限，它们会加以利用。保存重要隐私信息的相册敞开大门后，它们就在其中不知廉耻地乱翻，搜寻任何感兴趣的信息。

这意味着，今天之前所有给予过上述 APP 相册完整权限的用户，他们的隐私都受到了侵犯。

这告诉我们，不能过于高估任何应用商店或者操作系统对隐私的保护能力，也不要低估那些 APP 厂商窥视用户隐私的执念。

title: (安卓)淘宝将手机里的照片视频复制到私有目录下(转)
content:
今天，有网友发现淘宝 APP 会将用户手机里的照片视频复制到了它的私有目录下。

具有 root 权限的用户，能够在安卓系统根目录 /data/data/com.taobao.taobao/cache/ 文件夹里发现自己手机里的照片视频，其中甚至还包含从 telegram 下载的媒体。而这正是淘宝应用的私有目录。

现在还不清楚淘宝获取这些内容的动机，以及是否会将这些媒体文件上传，但是毫无疑问如果需要它的确可以做得到。

这一现象在中国国内应用商店和 Google Play 的淘宝 APP 中均获得验证，iOS 还未发现问题。

title: 建议大家早早的拔掉智齿
content:
本来对医学史就有些兴趣，也知道不少医学知识；好几年前就安利认识的人注意口腔健康（特别是有口臭的人），什么阿兹海默可能与口腔健康有关 等等张口就来，但涉及到自己的行动，就有点慢了。

年初的时候，拔了一个上智齿；剩下的拖着就没拔。十一假期在家无聊，对着镜子看口腔，突然发现下侧两个智齿的龋齿很严重，并且已经挤歪了尖牙，赶紧早早地约了节后第一天的专家号。

刚刚拔掉同一侧的一上一下两个智齿，好家伙，自己没看到右上智齿，已经变糟牙了，牙髓一半裸露，医生也很震惊地问，你不牙疼么？ 看着这个 烂牙，终于明白了为啥认真刷牙会流血。。。。

同时约好了下周的号，拔最后一颗。 也算了了人生中的一件大事儿。

title: iPhone13Pro 的使用感受，经常在 Android 和 iPhone 之间跳跃的人开始迷茫了
content:
#### 个人的智能手机历史大概是
1. 三星 S5660
2. 小米 3
3. iPhone5c
4. iPhone6s
5. 一加 5T
6. 一加 7T
7. iPhone11(使用不到半个月卖掉)
8. 一加 8T
9. iPhone13 Pro


这次换 iPhone 的预期：

#### 达到的预期
1. iCloud 、相册、AppStore
2. 苹果生态（目前笔记本 iMac 耳机全是苹果的，这次国庆出游 AirDrop 什么的很方便）
3. 充电速度和续航还算满意
4. 摄影系统还算满意（电影效果拉垮，预期之内）
5. 信号有改善（这次在边境跟朋友的 Android 信号基本一致）

#### 纠结的地方
1. iOS 搭配 120hz 的流畅感（实际不达预期，系统应用 60-100hz 左右，微信淘宝微博等直接拉垮，一加 8T 绝大多数能达到 120hz ）
2. 之前用的 Android 6.55, 6.1 屏幕有点小, 不过能接受(即使这样，还是比 Android 重)
3. FaceID 戴口罩不能解锁（果真就美国国情？），早上睡眼朦胧不能解锁，手机放边上解锁不方便，相比而言屏下指纹真的方便多了。（苹果甚至侧边做个 TouchID 都好啊）
4. 返回的方式很不习惯，Android 的侧滑返回很方便，iOS 只支持从左边侧滑，用右手很容易握不稳，有些时候要两只手操作
5. 2021 年了没有游戏模式小窗，以前开黑天天吐槽用苹果的朋友回微信杀后台或者断线，现在轮到我自己了

#### 总结
总之就是一种恨铁不成钢 /"信仰"崩塌的感觉，苹果的确做了很多很棒的 Feature，但是关于最重要的用户体验步子迈得是不是小了一些，国内厂商内卷真的卷赢了么，iOS15 后续更新不知道能不能解决部分问题

如果一个公司，需要我费尽心思说服自己，费尽心思找平衡点和亮点，我不觉得是我应该再去喜欢的公司了。
以上都是个人真实使用感受，纠结的点在于，我不知道我是习惯了 Android，还是更适合 Android，但短期内应该不会换回 Android 了，换机成本太高了，暂时只能妥协了


**不知道从 Android 换回 iPhone 的人有没有同样的感受， 欢迎讨论**

title: 继[其实对老家很失望]后续
content:
趁着国庆回了一次老家，还是出现了类似的事。

下火车后要从 A 市-到我家所在的 B 市。遂在火车站附近的大巴站买了大巴票。

[晚 10 分钟左右发车，可以接受]

车上大概剩余座位 10 余个，于是开始出大巴站往高速入口走。


[市区半路载客]

车子按照小于 40KM/H 的速度在市区走，倒是没有兜圈子，"收"票员冲着窗外喊有没有人坐车之类的，竟然真的有几位上车。


[车子载货]

车子走到到高速入口一半的路上，碰到一个停在路边的五菱之光，顺道载了很多货在车上。


[高速路口载客]

高速路口载了两个客人。


[服务区载客]

其实我们两个市只有一个小时的车程，不需要进服务区的，车子进了服务区，开始喊那个提前联系好的人上车。


[甭管哪里上车票价都是一样的]


[车子很脏]

车子座椅上的遮布很脏，明显看到污垢。
回去的时候坐的同一个线路的车，自己坐的那个座位，靠椅不能调也不能躺，靠躺的话，靠背会一直往后倒。


[老家要修机场的钱被挪用]

2 年前知道自己所在的区附近的街道要修机场，这次回去特意打听了一下。说钱已经被挪用了。真特么流批。不愧是大河南。

title: 有开增程式电车的吗。想买电动车，求打醒
content:
今年有换车需求，本来六月下订了 Q5L，等了一个月结果因为缺芯片，4 儿子销售涨价三万，果断的放弃。这次换车不开奥迪，估计这辈子也不想开了。

这两个月试驾了理想和岚图，感觉都不错。本来媳妇只看 BBA，不过试驾了一下，觉得比 Q5L 舒服的多。
平时基本就俩人，所以想换岚图开，家里也有充电桩，觉得挺安逸。

迫于各种论坛都是水贴，想问问各大 V 友，这种增程式电动车咋样，后续有没有什么比较麻烦的问题。谢谢

title: 去哪个城市发展呢
content:
最近准备辞职了，毕业 2 年多一直很迷茫，没车没房没女朋友。我性格偏内向，工作是偏向制造业 /工业的，不属于互联网 IT，讨厌各种公司所谓的聚餐，酒局，人情世故，还要努力显得自己情商高，真的厌倦了。反正自己也孤身一人，准备去一个干净整洁新城。
我个人已经打算不结婚了，准备买个住房小公寓一个人生活了。只有 40W 的存款，看了一下目前所谓的二线 /新一线，南京 /杭州啥的感觉房价太高，有没有好的建议呢？

title: [成都] 前端/BA/UX/UI/Ruby/软件项目经理/Auto QA 活跃网络(成都)直聘 | 年假 17 天 | 拒绝打卡 | 技术流 | 硅谷风
content:
### **关于我们**
 
活跃网络(ACTIVE Network)成立于 1999 年，总部位于达拉斯，是全球领先的互联网在线产品及服务解决方案提供商。隶属于《财富》世界 500 强集团 Global Payments Inc.（纽约证券交易所代码：GPN ），该集团为全球客户提供领先的交易与支付软件技术解决方案长达 50 年之久，在全球拥有 24000 名员工，office 遍布 100 多个国家。
 
ACTIVE Network®依托于强大的 SaaS 技术平台为客户提供智能直观的注册、安全支付、前瞻性数据和服务，以帮助活动组织者简化管理，提高参与度和收入。在全球，我们服务于超过 32000 个活动组织者和 1500 万参与者。
 
ACTIVE Network® 的使命是: To make the world a more active place by connecting people to the things they love, want and need to do. 
 
### **我们的优势**
 
* 完善的 6 险 1 金，试用期全薪，社保足额缴交，年度免费 VIP 体检，商业保险全面覆盖员工门诊、住  院、意外、重疾并特别赠送配偶或子女商业保险，人性化服务让你兼顾个人与家庭需求。
 
* 15-25 天超长带薪年假，圆你一个环游世界的梦，弹性工作不打卡、高效工作不加班，拒绝 996，工作健康两不误。
* “员工感恩周”每年王牌员工活动期期不重样，欢声笑语中激励你发挥斜杠青年的特长，在活动中学习，在学习中成长； ACTIVEx 员工俱乐部霸气赞助，游泳、健身、足球、瑜伽…你的生活因你而精彩，更有额外 2 天 ACTIVEx 假期支持你的热爱。
* 扁平化管理、国际化团队、英文工作环境、在轻松的氛围里与项目组成员解决问题、追逐梦想，实现个人增值。
* 多元文化，更开放，更活跃。加入我们，500 强荣耀有你一份!
 
### **前端[15k-30k] HC- 6**
Responsibilities
 
* 2+ years’ experience with Agile, Scrum methodologies.
* 6+ years’ experience on client-side JavaScript development.
* Expertise with HTML5, Javascripts, Css and related debugging skills.
* Expertise in building complex layouts with CSS and HTML/XHTML.
* Good Experience on the JS Framework, such as React, Backbone, EmberJS, AngularJS, etc
* Experience on investigating and improving front end performance.
* Good understanding of HTTP, RESTful API and Web Security concepts.
* Strong Problem Resolving skills.
Good communication skill to work with distributed team.
* Continually research and learn the latest techniques and best practices for development and performance.
 
### **需求分析(Business Analyst)[15k-22k] | HC - 2**
 
Responsibilities
 
* Closely work with Product Manager for product development
* Take product feature ownership and manage full life cycle of the requirement
* Produce and maintain product backlog and participate in or drive sprint planning where appropriate
* Produce business and use cases where necessary to support product requirements
* Produce high quality business analysis artifacts in a timely manner, including user story, software requirement specification, functional specification
* Collaborate with UX & Visual designers for wireframe and visual assets
* Driving grooming meetings with implementation teams, and play an active role to clarify requirements and decision making to ensure implementation
* Communicate with customer/support and provide customer support where necessary
 
Requirements
 
* Must have strong analytical skills and problem solving skills
* Must possess excellent written and interpersonal communication skills and be able to effectively communicate across all levels of the organization
* Experience in requirement management, including requirements gathering, analysis, and specification documentation
* Ability to assume intellectual ownership and possess strong attention to details and commitment to delivering quality product
* Ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and synthesize cross-functional input in a team/collaborative environment
* Ability to learn and adapt quickly
* Experience in agile software development and web product design is preferred
* Excellent English Skills.
 
### **UX/UI[15k-18k] | HC - 2**
 
Responsibilities
 
* English communication skills.
* Degree or experience in a related field.
* Design portfolio showing Interaction Design for mobile or web-applications. We’re specifically interested in your user-centered design process and problem solving skills.
* A proven bias towards understanding and solving the problems of people. We’re not looking for coders or technologists.
* Exceptional teamwork and communication skills.
* Experience designing for the North American market.
* Experience working in a a SCRUM development environment, where you will attend daily scrums with co-located developers and your prototypes will serve as design specifications.
* Mobile design experience
* Understanding of how the web works, particularly browser-based presentation technologies.
* Axure RP rapid-prototyping software
* Fluency in English will be an advantage.
 
### **Ruby[15k-20k] HC - 2**
 
Responsibilities
 
* This role will design and build applications for web platforms using Ruby and Javascript/TypeScript, ensure the performance and quality of applications, collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features, identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs, and support the diagnosis of customer issues and resolution.
* 4+ years experience developing web applications
* Proficiency with Ruby,
* Experience with RESTful API design and/or GraphQL, JavaScript or Typescript, SQL and general relational databases knowledge.
 
 
### **软件项目经理[12k-16k] HC - 1**
 
Responsibilities
 
* Project manage various cross-functional software development projects
* Leverage your knowledge of Agile Scrum and DevOps to establish the proper project management practices; aligning with Active’s defined SDLC
* Champion, guide and coach software development teams to continuously improve and mature its processes and delivery practices using best practices, methodologies and GPMO tool sets; Guide the team on the adoption of an agile mindset and culture,
* Leverage your knowledge of the Project Management Body of Knowledge to manage scope, schedule, cost, quality, resources, communications, risk, stakeholders and project integration; Apply best practices and tools to improve project outcomes and ensure successful delivery
* Develop and manage detailed project management plans
* Develop and maintain detailed project scope and schedule baselines; enforce and facilitate the change management process
* Document, manage and mitigate project risks & issues; Escalate early and often in order to ensure successful outcomes and avoid impacts to project goals or delivery
* Report timely and accurate project status, performance and health broadly to all project stakeholders
* Perform other duties as assigned
 
Requirements
 
* BA/BS in computer science or equivalent experience
* Outstanding oral and written communication skills required
* Excellent English skills required
* Demonstrated project management experience, managing mid-large scale technical projects
* Min. 5 years of experience in a technology organization
* Min. 2 years of software development project management experience
* Strong knowledge & hands on experience with Agile Scrum and traditional IT project management methodologies required; DevOps experienced recommended
* Strong knowledge of SDLC, PMLC, IT deployments required
* Experience with multi-national, distributed teams is a plus
* Must be highly proficient in Microsoft Office and Microsoft Project
* PMP and CSM strongly recommended
 
### **自动化测试工程师[16k-21k] HC - 6**
 
This individual will play an important role in the design and implementation of frontend user interfaces in multiple web-based products and systems.  This is an exciting role that will use the latest technology and design patterns and allow substantial opportunity for growth.
Specific responsibilities:
 
* Participate in the entire Software development life cycle including requirement analysis, driving the testing strategy bases on the different business and stracture, designing good test cases with high coverage, reporting defects with meaningful details, providing the key steps and troubleshooting steps on the critical issues.
* Participating regular/daily triage review, taking production release testing for each release and IT changes, analyzing quality data for each outstanding release.
* Conduct the test plan for each iteration/release with manager.
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of team/test efficiency.
Hiring requirements:
* 5+ years’ experience in B/S, IOS and Android app testing, 3+ years' experience in software automation testing
* Excellent in Software Quality Assurance methodologies, process and best practices along with strong understanding of current Internet/mobile application development technology
* Expert in test cycles, test tools, and testing methodologies
* Good requirement/testing analysis and test case design/execution capability
* Experience in automated testing and automation framework setup.
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
* Experience in security testing is preferred
* Detailed knowledge of HTTP/s protocol, IOS and android app models, relational database and SQL
* Good English Reading and Writing; oral and listening is plus
* Teamwork, have initiative, take ownership
* Faster learner
 
 
 
### **如何申请**
请撰写一封正式求职邮件并附上简历，发至这个[邮箱](<mailto:Turbo.Lei@activenetwork.com>)，来信必复。

  • Strong knowledge of SDLC, PMLC, IT deployments required
  • Experience with multi-national, distributed teams is a plus
  • Must be highly proficient in Microsoft Office and Microsoft Project
  • PMP and CSM strongly recommended

自动化测试工程师[16k-21k] HC - 6

This individual will play an important role in the design and implementation of frontend user interfaces in multiple web-based products and systems.  This is an exciting role that will use the latest technology and design patterns and allow substantial opportunity for growth. Specific responsibilities:

  • Participate in the entire Software development life cycle including requirement analysis, driving the testing strategy bases on the different business and stracture, designing good test cases with high coverage, reporting defects with meaningful details, providing the key steps and troubleshooting steps on the critical issues.
  • Participating regular/daily triage review, taking production release testing for each release and IT changes, analyzing quality data for each outstanding release.
  • Conduct the test plan for each iteration/release with manager.
  • Contribute to the continuous improvement of team/test efficiency. Hiring requirements:
  • 5+ years’ experience in B/S, IOS and Android app testing, 3+ years' experience in software automation testing
  • Excellent in Software Quality Assurance methodologies, process and best practices along with strong understanding of current Internet/mobile application development technology
  • Expert in test cycles, test tools, and testing methodologies
  • Good requirement/testing analysis and test case design/execution capability
  • Experience in automated testing and automation framework setup.
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Experience in security testing is preferred
  • Detailed knowledge of HTTP/s protocol, IOS and android app models, relational database and SQL
  • Good English Reading and Writing; oral and listening is plus
  • Teamwork, have initiative, take ownership
  • Faster learner
